com.atakmap.android.bloodhound.ui

Class BloodHoundHUD

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.atakmap.android.widgets.MapWidget
        • com.atakmap.android.widgets.MapWidget2
          • com.atakmap.android.widgets.TextWidget
            • com.atakmap.android.bloodhound.ui.BloodHoundHUD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapWidget.OnLongPressListener

    public class BloodHoundHUD
extends TextWidget
implements MapWidget.OnLongPressListener
    A TextWidget responsible for handling the display of the bloodhound information. Includes:
    • Callsign of target map item
    • Current location of the target map item
    • Range and bearing information to the target map item
    • An ETA to the target map item
